content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great investment for your stay in Duisburg. Let's discuss the price. How much were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student and I am looking for a cheap apartment. I was thinking of offering 350 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 350 euros per month is much lower than my expectations. I'm looking to rent out my apartment for a price that reflects its prime location and modern amenities. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I can increase my offer. How about 400 euros per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While 400 euros per month is more in line with what I had in mind, I still believe my apartment is worth more considering its central location and the amenities it offers. Would you be willing to negotiate further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective. I can go up to 450 euros per month. This is the highest I can afford.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but 450 euros per month is still below my asking price. Given the quality of the apartment and its prime location, I'm looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a fair market rate. Would you be able to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. However, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I can go up to 475 euros per month, but I cannot afford any more than that.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I hear your situation, but 475 euros per month is still not what I'm looking for. I want to ensure that my apartment is rented to someone who values it appropriately. If you're unable to meet my price expectations, I may have to consider other options.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective. I can go up to 500 euros per month, but I cannot afford any more than that. This is my final offer.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Your offer of 500 euros per month is closer to my expectations, but it's still not quite there. I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the value of this apartment. If you're unable to meet my price, I'll have to look for someone who can.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
